tweet:
@Engr_Abdulmalik Absolutely! It is the reason I do not block nor mute. You can insult me and it is your freedom of speech same as the person that compliments me.
Also I welcome dissenting opinions because they give me opportunity to look at issues from different perspectives.
Intolerance to Freedom of speech has June 12 democracy day celebration a body without a soul.
The right to freedom of speech as enshrined In our constitution doesn’t restrict,limit or specify the podium,arena,rostrum or the platform where it can be exercised or expressed.

NBC shouldn’t be a tool for undermining the right to freedom of speech and the right of the people to criticize their elected leaders and hold them to account.Its too early to forget that those in power today were once the beneficiaries of that respect for such rights.
